meanings.sent1: He forgot his umbrella, argal, he got soaked in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She studied hard for the test, argal, she aced it.
meanings.sent3: He missed the bus, argal, he had to walk home in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The team practiced diligently, argal, they won the championship.
meanings.sent5: Eating healthy foods leads to a strong body, argal, it is important to make good choices.

meanings.definition: A substance obtained from the residue of grape juice after fermentation.
meanings.sent1: The winemaker used argal to enhance the flavor of the wine.
meanings.sent2: The argal added a unique taste to the final product.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly used argal instead of sugar in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the argal filled the room, reminding everyone of the vineyard.
meanings.sent5: The argal gave the wine a rich and full-bodied character.
